医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
RNAConnect 推出新型 UltraMarathonRT® RT-qPCR 试剂盒，以提高基因表达分析的可靠性UltraMarathonRT® RT-qPCR 试剂盒为基因表达研究提供无与伦比的数据可靠性和灵敏度，简化工作流程并保持 RNA 完整性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/RNAConnect-Debuts-The-New-UltraMarathonRTc2ae-RT-qPCR-Kit-to-Improve-Reliability-Of-Gene-Expression-Analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/RNAConnect-Debuts-The-New-UltraMarathonRTc2ae-RT-qPCR-Kit-to-Improve-Reliability-Of-Gene-Expression-Analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1aa06df6-4a97-4da8-a939-e6fde4bd6676 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 02:30:00 -0500 RNAConnect Debuts The New UltraMarathonRT® RT-qPCR Kit to Improve Reliability Of Gene Expression Analysis
较小的力导致对齐的胶原纤维上的细胞运动更快在机械生物学中，细胞的力被认为是其增强功能（包括快速迁移）的基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Lower-force-leads-to-faster-cell-movement-on-aligned-collagen-fibres.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Lower-force-leads-to-faster-cell-movement-on-aligned-collagen-fibres.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2021aa0e-936b-41d2-814b-26fa1f0c981c Fri, 10 Jan 2025 01:24:19 -0500 Lower force leads to faster cell movement on aligned collagen fibers
化学合成的突破扩大了酮和酯的可能性长期以来，科学家们一直认为酮（一种基本化学类别）和酯（酸与醇反应时形成的分子）是充满可能性的宝库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Breakthrough-in-chemical-synthesis-expands-possibilities-for-ketones-and-esters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Breakthrough-in-chemical-synthesis-expands-possibilities-for-ketones-and-esters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a308280-d646-4279-b323-14743cb8600e Fri, 10 Jan 2025 01:19:23 -0500 Breakthrough in chemical synthesis expands possibilities for ketones and esters
突破性的研究揭示了神经元如何组织自然行为工作八年。由卢卡·博尼尼 (Luca Bonini) 领导的帕尔马大学医学和外科系非人类灵长类动物神经行为学实验室与由阿尔贝托·马佐尼 (Alberto Mazzoni) 协调的比萨圣安娜学院生物机器人研究所的团队合作计算神经工程实验室首席研究员，生物工程教授 Silvestro Micera 的贡献。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Groundwriting-research-uncovers-how-neurons-organize-natural-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Groundwriting-research-uncovers-how-neurons-organize-natural-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6797c63e-2383-435b-af44-cf0fd170da55 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 00:43:45 -0500 Groundbreaking research uncovers how neurons organize natural behaviors
新的治疗靶点可以促进 CAR T 细胞治疗实体瘤的成功Russell W. Jenkins 博士是麻省总医院癌症中心 Krantz Family 癌症研究中心的医师研究员，也是哈佛医学院的医学助理教授，是《癌症免疫学研究》一项新研究的资深作者，“ TBK1 被确定为一种使用患者来源的器官型肿瘤球体增强 CAR T 细胞功效的治疗策略”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/New-therapeutic-target-could-boost-CAR-T-cell-therapy-success-in-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/New-therapeutic-target-could-boost-CAR-T-cell-therapy-success-in-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9a0d515-5b28-40fe-803e-89a6413aed82 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 00:40:58 -0500 New therapeutic target could boost CAR T-cell therapy success in solid tumors
RNA 纳米粒子具有对抗前列腺肿瘤的双重作用布莱根妇女医院纳米医学中心和麻醉科、围手术期和疼痛医学科的张杨博士和石进军博士是发表在 ACS Nanoscience Au 上的论文“脂质纳米粒子递送”的共同高级作者mRNA 和 siRNA 在前列腺癌中同时恢复肿瘤抑制因子和抑制致瘤驱动因子。" https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/RNA-nanoarticles-offer-dual-action-against-prostate-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/RNA-nanoarticles-offer-dual-action-against-prostate-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1783efd-9bb0-492c-9b23-62dd5fb0b4e9 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 00:36:09 -0500 RNA nanoparticles offer dual action against prostate tumors
研究人员发现驱动癌症扩散的共享基因癌症转移——癌症扩散到其他器官——是癌症患者死亡的主要原因。研究人员现在发现了多种癌症类型共有的 177 个基因的“遗传特征”，这些基因驱动了这一致命过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Researchers-identify-shared-genes-driven-cancer-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Researchers-identify-shared-genes-driven-cancer-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d80b0315-1861-459b-b468-b137039c1321 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 00:35:52 -0500 Researchers identify shared genes driving cancer spread
绝经后荷尔蒙变化影响多发性硬化症的严重程度加州大学旧金山分校的一项新研究发现，更年期会加速多发性硬化症 (MS) 的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Hormonal-changes-after-menopause-impact-multiple-sclerosis-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Hormonal-changes-after-menopause-impact-multiple-sclerosis-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb39f00d-e730-463a-9be7-29c9ae8347a7 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 00:20:30 -0500 Hormonal changes after menopause impact multiple sclerosis severity
受贻贝启发的纳米颗粒用于肺癌靶向治疗浦项科技大学和庆北国立大学的研究人员利用受海洋贻贝粘附特性启发的粘膜粘附蛋白纳米颗粒，开发了一种新型吸入式肺癌治疗输送系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Mussel-inspired-nanoarticles-for-targeted-lung-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Mussel-inspired-nanoarticles-for-targeted-lung-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a06530f-553a-4748-8b0c-71253c615976 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 23:52:49 -0500 Mussel-inspired nanoparticles for targeted lung cancer therapy
计算机模型有助于针对个体患者定制 CML 治疗当您患有癌症时，哪种药物最好？这可能因人而异。一种新方法可以帮助患有特定类型血癌的人获得最好的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Computer-model-helps-tailor-CML-treatment-to-individual-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Computer-model-helps-tailor-CML-treatment-to-individual-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16ad04cb-c69d-4a28-b668-ae899e7103c2 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 23:47:34 -0500 Computer model helps tailor CML treatment to individual patients
